entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0011.6821] It is expected that AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDefinedBenefitPensionAndOtherPostretirementPlansNetOfTax with a value of 296,444,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.sony.net/taxonomy/role/StatementOfFinancialPositionClassified should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:AccumulatedDefinedBenefitPlansAdjustmentMember and a reported value of -296,444,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.sony.net/taxonomy/role/DisclosureStockholdersEquityChangesInAccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDefinedBenefitPensionAndOtherPostretirementPlansNetOfTax fact are:
Period : 2018-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : JPY Decimals of AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDefinedBenefitPensionAndOtherPostretirementPlansNetOfTax : -6 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -6 Rule version: 7.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/313838/000119312518196263/sne-20180331.xml 903

property.name: label
property.value: Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Tax
